snippet.title: HookCat - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Play this noir inspired puzzle game created by Transcendent Games in 48 hours for the Game Maker Toolkit's Jam 2021.

July 1960 - the air is warm and stuffy, and you have just found your favourite rubber duck run over and without a head right in front of your home. Your hairs begin to rise as you swiftly grab your coat, hat and trusted hookshot, and venture out to track the culprit down - and make them pay for their crimes.

Play it now for free: https://indiegesindel.itch.io/hookcat
